external_games.name: Naughty Tales of Rabbits - A Cuckold RPG

name: Naughty Tales of Rabbits: A Cuckold RPG
summary: A whimsical RPG adventure where a loving couple must vanquish the four Elemental Demon Lords! There's just one problem- the girlfriend is lusted after by the denizens of this realm, and the boyfriend has a huge cuckold fetish!
